item.title: Docs: SAP Conversational AI
item.description:
SAP Conversational AI is a collection of natural language processing services. As the conversational AI layer of SAP Business Technology Platform, it enables users to build and monitor intelligent chatbots in one interface to automate tasks and workflows.

Description

SAP Conversational AI is a collection of natural language processing services. As the conversational AI layer of SAP Business Technology Platform, it enables users to build and monitor intelligent chatbots in one interface to automate tasks and workflows.

Version

unknown

Documentation

https://help.sap.com/viewer/product/SAP_CONVERSATIONAL_AI/latest/en-US

SLA

Data

SAP’s policy on data usage and management can be read about on the Online Data Agreement document https://www.sap.com/about/agreements/policies.html
